_header: Think of thy coat that is bright and gay
_description: A proverbial warning against pride — one couplet in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þenk of þi cote þat is brith an gayHou it sal ben
                    lined with grene & with gr[ey]
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 59.
